text:
="preserve">Muntukayise Bhekuyise Ntuli (24 December 1957 – 16 January 2021) was a South African politician. He was a member of the African National Congress. He was a Member of the National Assembly of South Africa from 1999 to 2003. Ntuli was born in Mtubatuba, South Africa.
Ntuli died on 16 January 2021 from COVID-19 in Pietermaritzburg, South Africa at the age of 63.

annotations.surface_form: Member of the National Assembly of South Africa
